description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              1. Responsibilities:
              
              	Identify and develop business opportunities for the Company’s creative solutions in Freight Forwarder/Logistics and product designs as well as the Company’s creativity services.
              

              2. Job description:
              
              - Design business solution/proposal for all RFQ/Tender about services of Freight Forwarder / Logistics…
              
              - Manage BD Team and monitor BD ’s team performance and motivating them to reach targets.
              
              - Make Cost Simulation and Prepare quotation for all RFQ/Tender (include Freight management , Customs. Clearance, Trucking, Warehouse , Distribution and other required by RFQ/tender).
              
              - Set up and manage overseas offices for expanding of business of the company.
              
              - Maintain and develop the relation with overseas agents.
              
              - Set up SOP and smooth Operation when secure new project.
              
              - Develop and manage marketing tools and collateral for existing and new clients.
              
              - Forecast long and short-range market potential in Vietnam for Management’s analysis.
              
              - Keep up to date market information and competitor.
              
              - Over views and reviews all the direct reports pertaining to accounting, lifting volume, etc.
              

              3. Benefits:
              
              - High salary depending on candidates' competencies.
              
              - Annual performance bonus.
              
              - Lunch, Phone allowances.
              
              - Social & healthcare insurance, premium medical insurance.
              
              - Annual health check and Company trip.
              
              - Bonuses at certain public holidays, bonus for Tet...
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - University degree in Transportation, Business Administration, Marketing or relevant field.
              
              - At least 5 years relevant working experience in Sales/Business Development in the field of logistics/ freight forwarding.
              
              - Minimum 2 year supervisor or manager experience.
              
              - Preferable have experience working overseas or setting up overseas offices.
              
              - Proven experience in setting up and implementing sales strategy and plan.
              
              - Fluent in English; Candidate can speak other language (Chinese, Korean, Japanese...)  will be priority.
              
              - Fluent in all commonly used office software.
              
              - Excellent communication and report writing skills.
              
              - Good in operation management and problem-solving skills.
              
              - Ability to negotiate well with customers and suppliers.
              
              - Ability to work independently, under pressure, and overtime to meet deadlines.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
